summary: Timeline_29 documents managing panic disorder and agoraphobia with professional help.

posts.text: Thought I was getting better but I'm not. I can't do anything right Back to square one. I'm completely numb Reminded myself that recovery isn't linear. talked to a friend about what I'm going through Reaching out for support instead of giving up. I'm not giving up
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I'm going to get fired, I know it. I'm disgusting My performance has been terrible. I can't get out of bed anymore Met with HR about accommodations. used my DBT skills They're being supportive. I'm proud of myself for trying
adaptive_evidence: I'm proud of myself for trying
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Another day of feeling terrible. I want to give up on everything I can't get out of bed anymore Went outside for 10 minutes. started going to therapy Called a friend. I'm worth the effort
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thought I was getting better but I'm not. I hate myself so much Back to square one. I isolated myself from all my friends Reminded myself that recovery isn't linear. reached out to my therapist Reaching out for support instead of giving up. I deserve to get better
maladaptive_evidence: I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feeling hopeful for the first time in months. asked for support I acknowledge my progress Had a bad moment yesterday. I'm worthless and pathetic But I worked through it using my tools. I acknowledge my progress
posts.summary: Post shows active coping and progress despite challenges

posts.text: I'm going to get fired, I know it. I'm broken beyond repair My performance has been terrible. I can't get out of bed anymore Met with HR about accommodations. started going to therapy They're being supportive. I'm committed to my recovery
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels impossible. I'm a burden to everyone I'm worthless. I'm losing my mind Did one small thing today - made my bed. joined a support group Trying to celebrate tiny victories. I'm worth the effort
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thinking about stopping my meds. I'm a burden to everyone I stopped taking my medication Called my psychiatrist first. started going to therapy We're trying a different medication instead. I'm building a support system
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels hopeless lately. I'm a burden to everyone I can barely get myself out of bed most days. I'm completely numb Today though, I managed to tried a new coping mechanism which is a small victory.
posts.summary: Post primarily shows distress with some coping attempts

posts.text: Had a really bad day after weeks of progress. I feel empty inside I've been having suicidal thoughts Using my coping skills instead of old habits. asked for support This setback doesn't erase my progress. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feel like I don't deserve to be loved. I can't do anything right I'm spiraling out of control My partner has been incredibly supportive. used my DBT skills Learning to accept help and love. I'm not giving up
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The depression is getting worse. I feel empty inside I stopped taking my medication I know I need help so I practiced my coping strategies My therapist suggested Things can get better
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thinking about stopping my meds. I'm a burden to everyone I'm spiraling out of control Called my psychiatrist first. took my medication as prescribed We're trying a different medication instead. I deserve to get better
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
